name: Rocket Blasters (itch) (Noahlencioni)
description:
*Please leave feedback as well as report any bugs.*

In the name of science, Cube Man has stolen a rocket launcher from the military and plans to prove once and for all that rocket jumping is possible. Angry, the physicists will do everything they can to take your rocket launcher. Will you let them win, or will you launch yourself to victory?

This is a concept game I made in my Game Development 1 class over the course of a week. Since then, I have fallen in love with this little shit of a game and plan to continue development as I work on other projects for the class.

This game favors precision over speed, but through testing, I have found some neat tricks I plan to add to future levels.

Controls

Left Mouse Click - Launch rocket

Escape -  Quit Game
